charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) and 924(a)(2) FIREARMS-Felon in possession of a firearm (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 months imprisonment on count one of the indictment. The sentence on count one is to run consecutively to state sentence presently being served. Defendant is remanded to the custody of the USM. Sentence to be followed by Supervised Release for a period of 3 years with special conditions. The defendant is to participate in a program for substance abuse as an in/out patient, including random drug testing and urinalysis, at such times and under such conditions as USPO directs. A special assessment of $50.00 is imposed. (1)
